title: BurnAware Professional 2.40(precracked)
description:
BurnAware Professional is the professionalÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s choice for complete CD & DVD media duplication and Blu-ray Disc recording. Apart from standard features, such as data, audio and video burning, BurnAware Professional offers a wide scope of advanced functionality, allowing you to duplicate CDs and DVDs, make exact copies of discs on your hard drive, write to multiple drives simultaneously.

Features

    * Create data, bootable and multisession CD/DVD/Blu-ray Discs
    * Create Audio CDs and MP3 CD/DVD/Blu-ray Discs
    * Create DVD-Video
    * Copy and backup CDs/DVDs (except Audio CDs)
    * Create and record disc images, boot images
    * Erase / Format rewritable discs
    * Supports all current hardware interfaces (IDE/SCSI/USB/1394/SATA)
    * Supports UDF/ISO9660/Joliet Bridged file systems (any combination)
    * Supports true, simultaneous image writing (up to 8 recorders at once)
    * On-the-fly writing for all image types (no staging to hard drive first)
    * Auto-verification of written files
    * Supports CD-Text and unicode characters
    * Supports Windows NT/2000/XP/Vista/7 (32 and 64 Bit), no drivers required

Benefits

    * Allows to record ISO images to separate drives simultaneously
    * Permitted for commercial use
    * Allows to duplicate discs or store them as ISO image files on your hard disk
    * Does NOT contain any spyware, adware, banners etc.
    * Does NOT require .Net framework or service packs
    * Based on the most stable and fast disc recording SDK
    * Windows 7 support
